about_the_game:
Destroy All Letters is a challenging typing game where your keyboard skills and speed are put to the test. The goal is to hit and destroy as many letters as possible before they reach the ground. Each letter you type correctly is destroyed, and your challenge is to do this without looking at the keyboard.

Game Features:

*Intense Gameplay: Letters fall from the top of the screen, and you must press the corresponding key to destroy them before they hit the ground.
*Speed and Accuracy Challenges: Improve your typing skills by facing challenges that require both speed and precision.
*Life System: You start with a limited number of lives. Each letter that hits the ground causes you to lose a life. The game ends when all your lives are gone.
*Scoring and Rankings: Achieve the highest score possible by destroying as many letters as you can without losing lives.
*Game Mode: Practice mode with increasing difficulty.
*Continuous Improvement: The game is designed to help you continuously improve your typing skills in a fun and engaging way.

Game Objective:

*Your main objective in Destroy All Letters is to survive as long as possible by destroying the letters before they reach the ground and cause you to lose lives. As you progress, the speed and frequency of the falling letters increase, challenging your skills and reflexes. With practice, you can become a typing master and reach the top of the rankings.

Tips for Playing:

*Stay Alert: Keep your eyes on the falling letters and be quick to identify the corresponding key.
*Practice Regularly: The more you play, the more you improve your typing skills.
*Focus on Accuracy: Avoid mistakes that can cause you to lose lives quickly.

Get ready for a typing challenge like no other and see how far you can go in Destroy All Letters!

name: Destroy All Letters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB de RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB de espaço disponível MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anyone

short_description: Destroy All Letters is a challenging game where you practice typing. Each time you type, your goal is to hit and destroy as many letters as possible without looking at the keyboard. Improve your typing skills by solving speed and accuracy challenges to achieve the best result.
